name: json-playback-recorder-ts
description: Framework for integrate entity object graph operations (field, collections modifications, etc) between backend and frontend.

scripts.build: npm run clear-all && npm run build-dist && npm run build-dist-test && npm run build-dist-dev
scripts.build-dist: npm run build:prepare-dist-folder      && tsc -p tsconfig-dist.json --extendedDiagnostics && npm run rename-typeslike-dist      && npm run embed-source-contents-dist      && npm run copy-recusive-dist
scripts.build-dist-test: npm run build:prepare-dist-test-folder && tsc -p tsconfig-test.json --extendedDiagnostics && npm run rename-typeslike-dist-test && npm run embed-source-contents-dist-test && npm run copy-recusive-dist-test
scripts.build-dist-dev: npm run build:prepare-dist-dev-folder  && tsc                       --extendedDiagnostics && npm run rename-typeslike-dist-dev  && npm run embed-source-contents-dist-dev  && npm run copy-recusive-dist-dev
scripts.build-vscode: npm run clear-dist-dev && npm run build-dist-dev
scripts.rename-typeslike-dist: node ./build-utils/mv-file -baseFolder ./dist/src      -relativeSourceFile typeslike-dist.d.ts -relativeTargetFile typeslike.d.ts -verbose true && node ./build-utils/mv-file  -baseFolder ./dist/src      -relativeSourceFile typeslike-dist.js -relativeTargetFile typeslike.js -verbose true
scripts.rename-typeslike-dist-test: node ./build-utils/mv-file -baseFolder ./dist-test/src -relativeSourceFile typeslike-dist.d.ts -relativeTargetFile typeslike.d.ts -verbose true && node ./build-utils/mv-file  -baseFolder ./dist-test/src -relativeSourceFile typeslike-dist.js -relativeTargetFile typeslike.js -verbose true
scripts.rename-typeslike-dist-dev: node ./build-utils/mv-file -baseFolder ./dist-dev/src  -relativeSourceFile typeslike-dev.d.ts  -relativeTargetFile typeslike.d.ts -verbose true && node ./build-utils/mv-file  -baseFolder ./dist-dev/src  -relativeSourceFile typeslike-dev.js  -relativeTargetFile typeslike.js -verbose true
scripts.clear-all: npm run clear-dist && npm run clear-dist-test && npm run clear-dist-dev
scripts.browserify: npm run build && browserify dist-dev/index.js --outfile browser.js
